question.questionText: Only one circuit below will light the bulb. Which one will work? Why is that the only circuit that will work?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: That circuit is the only circuit that uses all of the correct contact points.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: It is the only circuit that will work because the metal is touching the bottom and the wire is touching the bottom of the light.
